name: City Car drive Transport game
description:
Great Games for their functionality and Extremely smooth control.this game role playing a toady life rental car in the city from one place to another like as uber taxi and careem car online services.here you can pick passenger from one place and drop their destination.
You can really enjoy this game after plying it.very interesting game
Game features:
*Smooth and simple controls.
*Challenging level.
*Beautiful environment.
*Realistic sound effect.
*Great animation.
*Realistic city visuals.
